title: New: Tape Waves – Somewhere
body:
Dreamy lo-fi pop.

Just what I need on a mellow Sunday evening. With a **Beach Fossils** cover on their Soundcloud page, Charleston duo **Tape Waves** wear their influences on their sleeves, not that that’s necessarily a bad thing. _Somewhere_ is a lethargic, sugar-sweet jam, complete with Wild Nothing guitar hook and repetitive yet thoroughly enjoyable chorus.

excerpt.full: Dreamy lo-fi pop. Just what I need on a mellow Sunday evening. With a Beach Fossils cover on their Soundcloud page, Charleston duo Tape Waves wear their influences on their sleeves, not that that’s necessarily a bad thing. Somewhere is a lethargic, sugar-sweet jam, complete with Wild Nothing guitar hook and repetitive yet thoroughly enjoyable chorus.
